title: gregall
author: gregall
content: Looks like Snoop Dogg is now in the NFT business. He’s leveraging his bored ape to get into the restaurant business. As more and more celebrities get into crypto/NFTs, the closer we are to mass adoption.Twitter thread for reference: https://twitter.com/4kprotocol/status/1533900257683288070?s=21Thoughts?

comments.author: Ccexicocartel
comments.body: Do you really think we’re going to achieve mass adoption through celebrities?

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: I've watched a video of a person that gave a tour to that "what do you for a living" guy and that person, I don't know if Snoop's son or just someone that works for him.Snoop is likely focused in the NFT and that's he's seriously making big bucks there. Well, my thoughts on this, it is not a surprise to see people like him and other celebrities verge into NFTs and crypto.

comments.author: arwin100
comments.body: Quote from: Ccexicocartel on June 08, 2022, 12:30:11 AMDo you really think we’re going to achieve mass adoption through celebrities?Nope, they are here because they see a lot of money there and they are using there fame to get more $ on their bank accounts so expect that they are doing this for their own personal good. But somehow it can give good effects but don't think it will go for long term because knowing celebrities they are master on creating hypes to have good  exposure to theirselves and their products promoted.

comments.author: bmwister
comments.body: Wow, beautiful. Now everyone is going to the NFT. When to expect from Apple? Or have I already missed something?

comments.author: budz0425
comments.body: Quote from: arwin100 on June 08, 2022, 11:56:35 AMQuote from: Ccexicocartel on June 08, 2022, 12:30:11 AMDo you really think we’re going to achieve mass adoption through celebrities?Nope, they are here because they see a lot of money there and they are using there fame to get more $ on their bank accounts so expect that they are doing this for their own personal good. But somehow it can give good effects but don't think it will go for long term because knowing celebrities they are master on creating hypes to have good  exposure to theirselves and their products promoted.A lot of artists are now getting attracted to these NFT's, you're right they see big money because they are popular. so many fans are willing to pay thousands of dollars just to get these exclusive NFTs from their Idol.with these NFT's  they can promote their products without paying Taxes.

comments.author: spiker777
comments.body: Quote from: Ccexicocartel on June 08, 2022, 12:30:11 AMDo you really think we’re going to achieve mass adoption through celebrities?why not. they have huge follow base in social media sites. and also have good influence over their fans. so I really think celebrities getting into NFT will definitely help mass adoption.Quote from: arwin100 on June 08, 2022, 11:56:35 AMQuote from: Ccexicocartel on June 08, 2022, 12:30:11 AMDo you really think we’re going to achieve mass adoption through celebrities?Nope, they are here because they see a lot of money there and they are using there fame to get more $ on their bank accounts so expect that they are doing this for their own personal good. But somehow it can give good effects but don't think it will go for long term because knowing celebrities they are master on creating hypes to have good  exposure to theirselves and their products promoted.this is not about celebrities' only. everyone here is here for their own benefits and personal gains. so celebrities are too. but they surely helping to spread awareness and bring more people into NFT and crypto space.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Quote from: Ccexicocartel on June 08, 2022, 12:30:11 AMDo you really think we’re going to achieve mass adoption through celebrities?Having celebrities pushing innovations in to the public domain reaches more of a mass media demographic. On that basis alone I think having celebrities promoting NFTs is probably better than not having them promote it.Quote from: budz0425 on June 12, 2022, 11:58:47 AMA lot of artists are now getting attracted to these NFT's, you're right they see big money because they are popular. so many fans are willing to pay thousands of dollars just to get these exclusive NFTs from their Idol.with these NFT's  they can promote their products without paying Taxes. If it helps bringing NFTs or anything else that innovates to  bigger audience and if they made money along the way, what is wrong with that? I do not see it as a big problem rather it seems a small price to pay in order to maximise the potential of the NFT market.

comments.author: NFTmetria
comments.body: Snoop Dogg's NFT collection is still showing significant sales despite the bear market and significant drops in other popular collections.For many connoisseurs of the musician's work, owning NFTs from his collection evokes a sense of involvement and complicity in the life of a musician. It also satisfies the desire for collecting.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: Quote from: bmwister on June 08, 2022, 03:28:04 PMWow, beautiful. Now everyone is going to the NFT. When to expect from Apple? Or have I already missed something? Apple seems to be far from entering NFT or even any crypto related investment but of course things will change overtime , but it is early to expect .Quote from: NFTmetria on January 24, 2023, 08:12:52 PMSnoop Dogg's NFT collection is still showing significant sales despite the bear market and significant drops in other popular collections.For many connoisseurs of the musician's work, owning NFTs from his collection evokes a sense of involvement and complicity in the life of a musician. It also satisfies the desire for collecting.for where the money is, all people will try adopting , but musicians are not even far from other whales , they will try getting into something profitable and grab that opportunities every time.

comments.author: NFTmetria
comments.body: Quote from: Reatim on January 25, 2023, 05:18:22 AMfor where the money is, all people will try adopting , but musicians are not even far from other whales , they will try getting into something profitable and grab that opportunities every time.And Snoopy catches trends very quickly.
